Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Southampton, Days Inn Southampton Rownhams is convenient to Romsey Golf Club and Southampton City Golf Course. This hotel is within close proximity of University of Southampton and Stoneham Golf Club.

Rooms
Stay in one of 39 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and ATM/banking services. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Southampton, Days Inn Southampton Rownhams is convenient to Romsey Golf Club and Southampton City Golf Course. This hotel is within close proximity of University of Southampton and Stoneham Golf Club.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Romsey Golf Club - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Southampton City Golf Course - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
University of Southampton - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi
Stoneham Golf Club - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
The Rapids - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Broadlands Estate - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
King John's House and Heritage Centre - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Romsey Abbey - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
The Brook Theater - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Woodmill Outdoor Activities Centre - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Frankie's Fun Factory - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Eling Tide Mill - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Riverside Park - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Southampton Cruise Terminal - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Sir Harold Hillier Gardens - 6 km / 3.7 mi

The preferred airport for Days Inn Southampton Rownhams is Southampton (SOU) - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
